mapper.select: SELECT A.imanagement,A.year,A.month,A.month_limit monthLimit ,ifnull(A.month_limit - sum(B.current_menu_price),A.month_limit)balance ,ifnull(sum(B.current_menu_price) ,0)expense FROM p_management A INNER JOIN p_payment B ON A.imanagement=B.imanagement WHERE A.iuser=2 and A.YEAR=YEAR(NOW()) AND A.MONTH=MONTH(NOW())

select imanagement, year,month,month_limit monthLimit ,balance,expense from p_management WHERE iuser = #{iuser} AND (year < year (now()) OR (year = YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) AND month < MONTH(CURRENT_DATE))) order by year,month
SELECT imanagement,sum(current_menu_price) total FROM p_payment WHERE YEAR(payment_at) = YEAR(NOW()) AND MONTH(payment_at) = MONTH(NOW()) GROUP BY imanagement
